title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman  Parnell McNamara magnetic swipes

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman  Parnell McNamara magnetic swipes
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Fri, Oct 20 at 9:57 AM

Magnetic Swipe logs for , Thomas Parnell McNamara, Chris Eubank, Rebecca Eubank, and Cody Blossman for 901 Washington, Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center

Sing In Logs for,  Thomas Parnell McNamara, Chris Eubank, Rebecca Eubank, and Cody Blossman for 901 Washington, Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center

Or any record Keeping method of  physical presence or time spent at 901 Washington or Hwy 6 Jail and Jack Harwell Detention Center

 

#4

 

Need number of employees at the McLennan County Jail during each yearly period.

 

January the 1st 2013 until December 31st, 2013

 

January the 1st 2014 until December 31st, 2014

 

January the 1st 2015 until December 31st, 2015

 

January the 1st 2016 until December 31st, 2016

 

January the 1st 2017 until December 31st, 2017

 

January the 1st 2018 until December 31st, 2018

 

January the 1st 2019 until December 31st, 2019, to include the takeover the Jack Harwell Detention Center in September 2019

 

January the 1st 2020 until December 31st, 2020

 

January the 1st 2021 until December 31st, 2021

 

January the 1st 2022 until December 31st, 2022

 

January the 1st 2023 until October 20, 2023

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
